'''Timmie's Wish''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
# Give ten servings of [[Wheat]] to [[Timmie]]

==Request Details==
Help Needed:<br />
I don't know why, but I feel like the pigeons and ducks are coming less and less...<br />
Do they think that the feed I'm giving them is terrible?<br />
If anyone wants to help me, could you please gather {{Color|buzzword|ten spikes of wheat}} and bring them to me? I'd like to make them something good this time!

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Timmie:''' ...What are you doing! You're scaring the pigeons away!
:{{DIcon|Quest}} About the wheat...
:'''Timmie:''' Ah, you saw my commission, didn't you?
:'''Timmie:''' So did you get those ten spikes of Wheat?
:{{DIcon|Quest}} Got them right here.
::'''Timmie:''' Yup, this should do it! Thanks for helping me out. Take these, please.
::'''Timmie:''' Ten spikes of wheat... We can make something delicious out of that for sure!
:{{DIcon}} Not yet.
::'''Timmie:''' Well, give them to me once you're ready, then.
{{Dialogue end}}
